title: Crater Lake & White Bark Pine
description: Crater Lake National Park, Oregon USA Updated to 4K, geotagged 21 Feb 2025
author: Gordon Cottrell
generated_description: A panoramic view of a deep blue volcanic crater lake framed by weathered white bark pine trees in the foreground. The ancient pines display their characteristic twisted and gnarled branches shaped by harsh mountain conditions. Steep caldera walls and forested ridges create a dramatic backdrop around the pristine lake.
